name: Zeta Fighters
summary:
Zeta Fighters is a free-to-play blend between mobile cave shooter and MOBA (multiplayer online battle arena). With incredibly intuitive touch controls designed for competitive multiplayer gaming you'll master the ultimate space arena. Fight online, upgrade your spaceship and fight your way to the top. 

Zeta Fighters is built specifically for optimal online mobile gameplay experience and is currently available on Android and iOS devices.

With 15 unique weapons, stunning graphics, and intuitive touch-screen controls, Zeta Fighters makes it easy to jump into quick action-packed real-time space battles no matter where you are.

Zeta Fighters features
- Real-time 1vs1 cross-platform ranked matches
- Skill based matchmaking
- Amazing weapons like Pulse Cannon, Solar Wave, Plasma Blade, Mecha Worm and many more!
- New unique ships: Loviatar & Iku-Turso
- New ranked maps: Harvester & Fusion
- Destructible terrain
- Daily Missions
- Play with Friends - custom game mode for up to 6 players
- Train with bots
- Real-time leaderboards in-game and on website
- No timers, energy bars, or fuel — play as much as you want, whenever you want.
- Easy to learn, intuitive controls perfected for touch screens
- In-game chat functionality and friend list
